More Starting Point Options.desc: This adds more starting points options to the lobby settings.

More Income Options.desc: This adds more income options to the lobby settings.

More Time Options.desc: Unlucks more time options for the length of the game.

10 vs 10 Maps Unlocked.desc: This is going to unluck the 10vs10 maps in normal lobbys

Naval Maps Unlocked.desc: Make naval maps playable with land units.

Easy AI Gets No Bonuses.desc: AI difficulty in W:RD just means that harder AI get more starting points and income and more unit availibility. This makes Easy AI not have any bonuses at all.

All Units and Nations Become Blufor, Rem.desc: Moves all units and nations from Redfor to Bluefor. Removes all coalitions except Scandinavia and Eurocorps. Change lobby settings to be Blufor vs Blufor if enabling this.

Every Deck Gets 900 Activation Points By.desc: Gives all you decks 900 Activation points. (Make the greatest battle ever seen!)

No Countries/Coalitions Get Activation B.desc: Non of the Countries/Coalitions get extra deplyment points.

15 Slots per Category.desc: Decks get 15 deck slots by default. Conflicts with '9 Slots per Category'

9 Slots per Category.desc: Decks get all 9 deck slots by default. Conflicts with '15 Slots per Category'.

99 Deck Cards per Unit.desc: All units will get 99 availibility cards

Every Unit has 9999 Availibility.desc: All of your units will have 9999 Availibility, sometimes it will also give you 9999000 somehow?

No Units are Prototypes.desc: Self explanatory, setes all prototype units to normal units.

FOBs Have Unlimited Supplies.desc: All FOBs, Logistic Trucks and helicopters has unlimited supplies. (Almost...)

Ground/Sea Units Reload and Refuel Faste.desc: Also self explanatory, all you Ground and Naval units resupplies and refuels faster.

Planes Reload and Refuel Faster.desc: Same as the above, all planes resupplies and refuels faster.

All Units Have Unlimited Fuel.desc: This affects all units, not just player units.

All Units Have Unlimited Health.desc: This affects all units, not just player units.

All Units Have Unlimited Ammo.desc: This affects all units, not just player units.

All Units Have 1 Second Spawn Time.desc: This affects all units, not just player units.

All Planes Fly Higher.desc: This affects all units, not just player units.

Naval Supply Ships Speed Buff.desc: Makes the resupplie ship sail faster.

All Ground Vehicles are Slower.desc: Road speeds are significantly slower, off-road speeds are 20% slower.

999 Starting Political Points In Campaig.desc: Players get 999 political points when starting any campaign.

Display Realistic Ranges In Game.desc: Divides all displayed ranges by 3.5 to reflect realistic values but does not effect gameplay
